summary: Prevent non-capacity tuning rollouts for app-health incidents and gate support remediation proposals by actual capacity pressure

changes.description: Require capacity pressure before applying live tuning profile resource updates by default; allow explicit override via force_apply=true.
Only suggest swarm_tuning_profile_apply from support diagnostics when swarm capacity signals indicate real resource pressure.
Update cloud-swarm php-fpm image health checks to use an internal FastCGI probe so app-level Magento 500s no longer trigger container restart loops.
